So I just installed all the expansions and stuff packs and thought that I will share this. I used Daemon tools lite to mount the files. I used winrar to unpack the files if needed
I did not use any patches or cracks except for updating the base game when it asked me to before installing any expansion and I only used crack on The Sims 3 Showtime
Install order -
The Sims 3 base game - http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5022393/The_Sims_3_-_Razor1911_Final_MAXSPEED
Keygen can be found in the Razor1911 folder when you have mounted the disc
The Sims 3 World Adventures - http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5168507/The_Sims_3_World_Adventures-RELOADED
Unpack rld-s3wa files with winrar and mount the iso file, Keygen can be found in the Crack folder
The Sims 3 High End Loft Stuff - http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5329998/The.Sims.3.High.End.Loft.Stuff-ViTALiTY
Unpack with winrar and then mount the iso, serial key is in the readme: V677-YLAC-SCRM-E201-0VTY
The Sims 3 Ambitions - http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5602463/The_Sims_3_Ambitions-ViTALiTY-[tracker.BTARENA.org].iso
serial key is in the readme: VJZR-UPAC-SCRM-PITA-LITY 
The Sims 3 Fast Lane Stuff - http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5826522/The_Sims_3__Fast_Lane_Stuff_[FULL]___Games4theworld__
serial key: VPMV-7PYX-VTY6-RTY6-6VTY
The Sims 3 Late Night - http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5913558/The.Sims.3.Late.Night-RELOADED-[tracker.BTARENA.org] 
keygen in the Crack folder
The Sims 3 Outdoor Living Stuff - http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6142434/The.Sims.3.Outdoor.Living.Stuff-FLT-[tracker.BTARENA.org].iso
keygen in the Fairlight folder
The Sims 3 Generations - http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6427325/The_Sims_3_Generations-RELOADED
Keygen in the Crack folder
The Sims 3 Town Life Stuff - http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6566982/The.Sims.3.Town.Life.Stuff-RELOADED
Keygen in the Crack folder
The Sims 3 Pets http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6753158/The_Sims_3_Pets-FLT-[BTARENA.org].iso
Keygen in the Fairlight folder
The sims 3 Master suite stuff http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/6984311/The_Sims_3__Master_Suite_Stuff_[FULL]___Games4theworld__
serial keys can be found from the # installation guide
The sims 3 Showtime http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7084772/The_Sims_3_Showtime-FLT
Keygen in Fairlight folder, copy the Game folder from Fairlight and paste it into the sims 3 base game (not showtime) installation folder overwriting everything

Had a few probs at first, after I kept getting the message that it could not verify that it was genuine, and asked me to contact customer service...
Well, fuck customer service... The internet is its own customer service and after a bit of searching I found out all you have to do is.....
....... copy the crack and the .dll file again and go into your installation folder and paste them there. Just delete the files 'TSLHost.dll and TS3W' from the original 'The Sims 3' Folder and replace with the cracked ones. 
 i.e don't load up the game until you've copied the crack again. 
worked for me....
Hope this helps people with the same problem. Peace Bitches x

Hi again :D I could install it , but now it just asks for the disk !! ? Help please

@maebba,
You need to open the file you downloaded with WinRAR, look for the folder named "Crack", extract that to your desktop or somewhere.
After that, follow these steps:
**I know you have a Mac, im posting instructions for Windows. Just improvise and figure it out.**
1. Open "My Computer or Computer"
2. Go to your C:\ Drive
3. Go to Program Files(x86)
4. Go to Electronic Arts
5. Go to The Sims 3 **Not showtime.. the original**
6. Go to Game
7. Go to Bin
8. Open the folder you extracted earlier named "Crack", now highlight all files and drag them into the bin folder. 
9. Copy and Replace
Now open the Sims 3 again and try to play.
*Maebba, I forgot to add the crack will be in the Fairlight folder

Heres The Exact Way To Download Any Sims Games

1.Download Utorrent
2.Download Game With Utorrent (Could Take Days)
3.When Done Downloading Double Click The File
4.Download Poweriso
5.Extract Game To Poweriso
6.Go To Setup And Double Click And Select Exract All Files To The Temporary Folder
7.Mount The Game To One Of The Virtural Drives
8.Enjoy!!!
